workbookDisplayName.defaultValue: Arc SQL Single Pane of Glass

metadata.description: The friendly name for the workbook that is used in the Gallery or Saved List.  This name must be unique within a resource group.
The gallery that the workbook will been shown under. Supported values include workbook, tsg, etc. Usually, this is 'workbook'
The id of resource instance to which the workbook will be associated
The unique guid for this workbook instance
The resource Id for the SQL Licensing Summary Workbook

]","timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000},"value":"aoag"}],"style":"pills","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"},"name":"parameters - 0"},{"type":12,"content":{"version":"NotebookGroup/1.0","groupType":"editable","title":"General Information","items":[{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"resources
	| where type == 'microsoft.azurearcdata/sqlserverinstances' or type == "microsoft.sqlvirtualmachine/sqlvirtualmachines" or type == 'microsoft.sql/servers/elasticpools' or ['type'] == "microsoft.sql/managedinstances" or type =~ 'Microsoft.Sql/servers/databases'
	| where ["kind"] !contains 'system'
	| extend propertiesState = tostring(properties.state)
	| extend propertiesStatus = tostring(properties.status)
	| extend version = tostring(properties.currentVersion )
	| extend patch = properties.patchlevel
	| extend vcore = tostring(properties.vCore)
	| extend vcores = tostring(properties.vCores)
	| extend license = case(properties.licenseType == "BasePrice", "Azure Hybrid Use",
						properties.licenseType == "LicenseIncluded", "Pay as you Go",
						tostring(properties.licenseType)
					)
		| extend poolId = tolower(tostring(properties.elasticPoolId))
	| join kind=leftouter (
		resources
		| where type == 'microsoft.sql/servers/elasticpools'
		| extend poollicense = case(properties.licenseType == "BasePrice", "Azure Hybrid Use",
			properties.licenseType == "LicenseIncluded", "Pay as you Go",
			"Unknown"
		)
		| extend lowerid = tolower(id)
	) on $left.poolId == $right.lowerid
	| extend license = iff(isempty(poollicense), license, poollicense)

| project id, name","size":1,"title":"SQL Resources (Select SQL Servers to filter)","exportMultipleValues":true,"exportedParameters":[{"fieldName":"id","parameterName":"sqlResource","parameterType":5}],"queryType":1,"resourceType":"microsoft.resourcegraph/resources","crossComponentResources":["value::all"]},"name":"sqlitems"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"let auto_bin_time = toscalar(InsightsMetrics
| summarize MaxTime = max(TimeGenerated), MinTime = min(TimeGenerated)
| extend TimeDiff = MaxTime - MinTime
| project BinTime = case(
    TimeDiff >= time(12h), timespan(5m),
    TimeDiff >= time(2d), timespan(15m),
    TimeDiff >= time(7d), timespan(30m),
    TimeDiff >= time(30d), timespan(1h),
    TimeDiff >= time(60d), timespan(6h),
    TimeDiff >= time(120d), timespan(12h),
    TimeDiff >= time(365d), timespan(24h),
    timespan(1m)
));
let sqlList = dynamic([{sqlResource}]);
let filteredMetrics = materialize(InsightsMetrics
| where Name in ('UtilizationPercentage', 'AvailableMB', 'ReadBytesPerSecond', 'WriteBytesPerSecond', 'TransfersPerSecond')
| where iff(array_length(sqlList) == 0, true, _ResourceId in~ (sqlList))
| extend Computer = tostring(split(Computer, ".", 0)[0])
| summarize avg(Val) by _ResourceId, bin(TimeGenerated, auto_bin_time), Computer, Namespace, Name, Tags);

filteredMetrics
| distinct _ResourceId, Computer, TimeGenerated
| join kind = leftouter (
    filteredMetrics
    | where Name == 'UtilizationPercentage'
    | extend cpuAvg = round(avg_Val, 2)
    | project _ResourceId, cpuAvg, TimeGenerated
)
on $left._ResourceId == $right._ResourceId and $left.TimeGenerated == $right.TimeGenerated
| project-away _ResourceId1, TimeGenerated1
| join kind = leftouter (
    filteredMetrics
    | where Name == 'AvailableMB'
    | extend availMemMbAvg = avg_Val
    | extend totalMemory = todouble(parse_json(Tags).['vm.azm.ms/memorySizeMB'])
    | extend utilMemoryPercent = round((100 - (availMemMbAvg/totalMemory * 100)), 2), totalMemory = round(totalMemory)
    | project _ResourceId, utilMemoryPercent, TimeGenerated
)
on $left._ResourceId == $right._ResourceId and $left.TimeGenerated == $right.TimeGenerated
| project-away _ResourceId1, TimeGenerated1
| join kind = leftouter (
    filteredMetrics
    | where Namespace == "Network"
    | where Name == 'ReadBytesPerSecond'
    | summarize networkReadMbPerSecondAvg = round(sum(avg_Val)/1024/1024, 2) by _ResourceId, TimeGenerated
)
on $left._ResourceId == $right._ResourceId and $left.TimeGenerated == $right.TimeGenerated
| project-away _ResourceId1, TimeGenerated1
| join kind = leftouter (
    filteredMetrics
    | where Namespace == "Network"
    | where Name == 'WriteBytesPerSecond'
    | summarize networkWriteMbPerSecondAvg = round(sum(avg_Val)/1024/1024, 2) by _ResourceId, TimeGenerated
)
on $left._ResourceId == $right._ResourceId and $left.TimeGenerated == $right.TimeGenerated
| project-away _ResourceId1, TimeGenerated1
| join kind = leftouter (
    filteredMetrics
    | where Namespace == "LogicalDisk"
    | where Name == "ReadBytesPerSecond" or Name == "WriteBytesPerSecond"
